Demographics: 38,400,000 in Spain (ELDIA 2012). Population total all countries: 414,170,030. L2 users: 7,490,000 in Spain (ELDIA 2006).
55,600,000 in United Kingdom (ELDIA 2012). Population total all countries: 335,148,868. L2 users: 1,500,000 in United Kingdom (Crystal 2003). L2 users worldwide: 505,000,000.
10,000,000 in Portugal (ELDIA 2012). Population total all countries: 203,349,200.
3,750,000 in Spain (ELDIA 2012). Population total all countries: 4,079,420. L2 users: 5,150,000 in Spain (ELDIA 2012).
57,700,000 in Italy (ELDIA 2012). Population total all countries: 63,655,047.
